page.title: 19Employment at Notgrove
page.content:
Employment is high, most working on the farms in the area. Labour relations are good, with the main employer being Mr. Acland of Notgrove Manor, who is well liked in the village.
The farms are in a viable farming area with the neat well maintained cottages indicating a prosperous area. Notgrove Church has its main fund raising at the May Bank Holiday, when a grand fete is held in one of the beautiful village gardens, and usually raises hundreds of pounds.
There is no mains gas in the area, but everyone is connected to the electricity supply. 1 or 2 cottages use Calor Gas.
